# reloadImage()

**Instance Method**

Requests a new image for the custom tool item from the image provider.

## Declaration

```swift
func reloadImage()
```

## Discussion

Calling this method requests a new image for the custom tool item from the [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKToolPickerCustomItem/Configuration-swift.struct/imageProvider] of the [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKToolPickerCustomItem/configuration-v7e5].

The system automatically calls this method when PencilKit attributes like [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKToolPickerCustomItem/color] or [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKToolPickerCustomItem/width] change. You can call this method when you need to generate a new image for the custom tool item that’s different from the current image.
